text.div:
MedComHospitalNotification

The official URL for this implementation guide is: 

http://medcomfhir.dk/ig/hospitalnotification/ImplementationGuide/medcom.fhir.dk.hospitalnotification

The DK MedCom HospitalNotification IG

extension.valueMarkdown: Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on HL7 Terminology

resource.name: MedComHospitalNotificationEncounter
resource.description: Encounter derivation that handles hospital notification when a patient is admitted to a hospital. The hospital notification is always send from a hospital. The receiver of the message is the patients home municipalicy. The hospital notification is send for example when patient is admitted, on leave, returned from leave, finished hospital stay.

resource.name: MedComHospitalNotificationMessage
resource.description: A message for a HospitalNotification. The message is triggered as patients are admitted, onleave or has finished a hospital stay in order to notify the relevant Municipalicy home care

resource.name: MedComHospitalNotificationMessageHeader
resource.description: MessageHeader for a HospitalNotification message.

resource.name: MedComHospitalNotificationLeavePeriodExtension
resource.description: Includes timestamps for start and end of leave of a hospitalization.

resource.name: MedComReportOfAdmissionExtension
resource.description: Indicates whether the recipient should send a report of admission

resource.name: MedComReportOfAdmissionRecipientExtension
resource.description: Recipient of a report of admission response
